text: Approval for the s. m. a. r. t. nitinol stent system and s. m. a. r. t. control nitinol stent system.  The devices are indicated for improving luminal diameter in patients with symptomatic atherosclerotic disease of the common and/or external iliac arteries up to 126 mm in length, with a reference vessel diameter of 4 to 9 mm, and angiographic evidence of a patient profunda or superficial femoral artery.
